participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Caring and introspective, always seeking to understand others deeply. Enjoys outdoor activities and has a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_1.background: my parents taught me survival skills. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. i'm an avid kayaker. i walk dogs for a living. i'm also a graduate student.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and energetic, loves to be in the spotlight and strives to achieve her goals with determination.
participant_2.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i'm currently in high school.

content.text: I`d like o be a doctor to help the humans.
I think I`d be a good therapist, what do you think?
What is your goal next year?
I`m in hign school and I don`t like it. What aout you?
